short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a Google Meet with a click of a button, automatically mute audio and video, and copy the Google Meet URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Name: Google Meet Auto Mute

Description:

Google Meet Auto Mute is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your Google Meet experience. With just a click of a button, this extension allows users to effortlessly create Google Meet sessions, automatically mutes both audio and video upon initiation, and conveniently copies the meeting URL to the clipboard.

Key Features:

1. Effortless Meeting Creation: MeetMuteCopy simplifies the process of creating Google Meet sessions. Users can initiate a meeting with a single click, saving time and eliminating unnecessary steps.
2. Automatic Audio and Video Muting: Upon meeting creation, MeetMuteCopy automatically mutes both audio and video streams. This feature ensures a professional and distraction-free environment from the moment the meeting starts.
3. Convenient URL Copying: After initiating the meeting, MeetMuteCopy seamlessly copies the Google Meet URL to the clipboard. Users can easily share the meeting link with participants via email, messaging platforms, or any other communication channels.
